meanings.definition: The ability to detect whether someone is gay or not based on intuition or observation.
meanings.sent1: Her gaydar was spot on when she correctly guessed that her new coworker was gay.
meanings.sent2: I rely on my gaydar to figure out if someone is gay or not.
meanings.sent3: His gaydar must be broken today because he completely misjudged his friend's sexual orientation.
meanings.sent4: She felt like her gaydar was a superpower, allowing her to see things others couldn't.
meanings.sent5: Using my gaydar, I could tell right away that he was part of the LGBTQ+ community.

meanings.definition: A person's instinctive or intuitive sense of whether someone is gay or not.
meanings.sent1: His gaydar told him that his classmate might be gay.
meanings.sent2: She trusted her gaydar when she suspected her neighbor was gay.
meanings.sent3: Their gaydar was surprisingly accurate at the party, correctly identifying most of the LGBTQ+ guests.
meanings.sent4: Even though it's just a feeling, her gaydar rarely fails her.
meanings.sent5: With his strong gaydar, he could easily pick up on subtle cues about people's sexual orientation.
